#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b

using namespace std;

int noofones(long long n)
{
    int ones = 0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        ones++;
        n = n &(n-1);
    }
    return ones;
}

int getdays(int a)
{
    int ones = noofones(a);
    int bytes = log2(a);
    bytes++;
    int zeros = bytes - ones;
    ones--;
    return (zeros+2*ones);
}

int getanswer(long long n)
{
    int answer = 99999999;
    int bytes = log2(n)+1;
    for(int i=1;i<bytes;i++)
    {
        long long p = pow(2,i) - 1;
        int alice = n & p;
        int bob = n - alice;
        if(alice == 0)
        {
            int bdays = getdays(bob);
            answer = bdays -1;
        }
        //cout<<alice<<"*"<<bob<<endl;
        int adays = getdays(alice);
        int bdays = getdays(bob);
        //cout<<adays<<"*"<<bdays<<endl;
        int maxd = adays > bdays ? adays : bdays;
        answer = answer < maxd ? answer : maxd;
        //answer = min(answer,max(getdays(alice),getdays(bob)));
    }
    return answer;
}

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        long long N;
        scanf("%lld",&N);
        int ans = getanswer(N);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
